key.name: length-units-from-file
key.summary: Use length unit from photometric file
key.description: Whenever applicable, display length the same units as used in the photometric file instead of the selected ones.

key.name: preferred-length-units
key.summary: Preferred units to be used when displaying length values
key.description: All length values from the photometric file will be converted to the selected unit when displaying in the UI.

key.name: diagram-style
key.description: Configures amount of details showed in the diagram.

key.name: snap-value-angles-to
key.description: Configures whether the guides with intensity values should be scaled to max value or the closest round number.

key.name: display-half-spaces
key.description: Decides whether only the relevant half space or full 180 degrees of gamma values should be displayed.

key.name: diagram-theme
key.description: Name of the scheme to use. If scheme with the specified name is not found, default will be used.
